label: curriculum      The process of testing and documenting knowledge or skills based on previous instruction in order to refine and improve student learning.
dean role
definition: Dean Role- A role in educational institutions that is satisfied by having academic, programmatic, managerial and fiscal responsibilities.
example of usage: Dean of csusb for the college of natural sciences

label: dean
definition: Dean- A person that satisfies the requirements for dean role.
example of usage: Sastry Pantula is a dean at CSUSB

label: educational institution
definition: An organization such as a public or private secondary school, vocational school, correspondence school, business school, junior college, teachers’ college, college, normal school, professional school, university, or scientific or technical institution, or any other institution if it furnishes education at the secondary school level or above.
example of usage: A college is an educational institution.

label: college
definition: An educational institution or establishment, in particular one providing higher education or specialized professional or vocational training.

label: professor
definition: A person that satisfies the professor role.
example of usage: Hector is a professor of philosophy at Mt. San Jacinto College.

label: professor role
definition: A role in a higher educational institution consisting of conducting research in a field of expertise, leading lectures/seminars in that field of expertise, and taking on additional managerial roles such as department chair or lead researcher for a particular project or institute.
example of usage: A person satisfying the professor role might conduct research in philosophical logic while also being the head of the philosophy department at their university.

label: student
definition: A person that satisfies the student role
example of usage: Timothy was a student at CSUSB.

label: student role
definition: A role consisting in attending an educational institution and completing courses to obtain proficient knowledge in some specified subject(s).
example of usage: A person attending a universiity and taking courses in philosophy.

label: academic curriculum
definition: A generically dependent continuant constituted by a collection of information content entities, each entity being about the same subject matter with some entities having a cumulative relationship with others, which imparts upon students proficient knowledge of that subject matter and is determinative of successful completion of a course in that subject matter.
example of usage: A curriculum for a high school algebra course might consist of homework assignments and practice sheets, online videos, and in class handouts.

label: academic course
definition: The process of teaching, assesssing, and crediting through which knowledge contained in an academic curriculum is imparted upon students.
